Author: Colgate_Grizi7
Text: You can do it but it doesn’t necessarily mean you should, going by your numbers your weight will have gone up by 0.8kg and that’s not even 2 lbs please try not to stress too much, I know it’s much easier said than done, but do what your body feels and tells you to do, not necessarily what the scale dictates, please try and be kind to yourself, stay strong ❤️
